messages.subject: toddler bicycle seat  (was Re: Life Learning magazine)
messages.msgSnippet: WOW!!!  That is SO cool!  I ve always fancied the ride behind tent-like carriers, but this is just WOW!  Having 3 little ones too small to ride bikes, I may
messages.messageBody:
WOW!!! That is SO cool! I've always fancied the ride behind tent-like
carriers, but this is just WOW! Having 3 little ones too small to ride
bikes, I may have to invest in one of these! This way, two could ride in
the tent and watch the other kids ride their bikes while one can sit up
front for some special Mommy time. Then we can take turns! What an
exercise motivator. >BG< It's so hard to get exercise with all the little
ones. They hate being pinned up in a stroller, of course!, and a sling gets
really hot really FAST on a Texas walk, but this looks like so much FUN!

Thanks so much for the link, as I don't have the magazine, YET!

Jennifer
